name: MiddleWalker
description:
A first person narrative/puzzle game where you must harness the powers of both an ancient spirit and a ruthless demon to escape.

Controls:

Move- W, A, S,D

Jump- Space 

Crouch- CTRL

Shift Balance to the "Founder"- Q

Shift Balance to the "Demon"- E

Pick up objects: M1

Move object that is being held: Middle mouse button

Group members:
  • Joseph Antonucci: Level & Game Design
  • Dihlon luther: Producer & Narrative Design
  • Alfredo Rodriguez: Programming & Systems Design
  • Drew McNamer: Sound & Audio Design
  • Nico Perez-Garcia: Lighting & Quality Assurance
